about eRiN m. or erIN M.? LOL

yes!! glad you caught my meaning, any thing but mud is acceptable! :)

also, i know this has been brought up before, but just a request to try to
have people cut and paste for replying, or at least be sure that the whole
piece you are replying to doesnt get sent back. on someones response, the
entire digest from the day before got included at the end, making for a very
loooooong digest!!!!! thanks everybody. erin m.
